question: The World Day of Social Justice was observed globally on 20 February 2017 with the theme
option1: A Just Transition - environmentally sustainable economies and societies
option2: Building a solid and interactive bridge in the world to accelerate ending FGM by 2030
option3: Preventing conflict and sustaining peace through decent work
option4: Challenges and Achievements of the Durban Declaration and Programme of Action - 15 years after
answer: Preventing conflict and sustaining peace through decent work
